rev.desc.rev.desc: Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Dump the dbdict and datadict for sqlcompare into preupg.bin
Build will continue even if dump Delta Migration Tool or Business Purge Tool fail
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Dump BusinessPurgeTool.unl into upgrade utility
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Dump more formats into preupg.bin
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Refactor the sql to generate transfer.bin and preupg.bin
Do NOT generate sqlupgrade.unl again
update panel dump.dmt, change unload name
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Do NOT dump Delta Migration Tool for create custom upgrade package
Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade to SM9.62
Reduce the size of preupg.bin: Do NOT dump non-English format and scmessage to preupg.bin
AGMRQ10H43093 Smart Upgrade Utility I: Make smart upgrade utility for both classic and lightweight upgrade - part 1
Update log path
add panel dump.dmt, use unload script instead
update panel setup.dmt, update $L.dmt.sl
Upgrade Utility: allow to execute upgrade silent
Dump RAD apm.upgrade.apply.bg and apm.upgrade.sqlcompare.bg into preupg.bin
Upgrade Utility: allow to execute upgrade silent
Dump RAD wizard.run.ex into preupg.bin
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade: Do not upgrade codes of Upgrade Utility during upgrade
Dump enclapplrev into preupg.bin and sqlupgrade.unl
The HP logo/Page title do NOT get rebranding on Purge Upgrade Files page
Dump format apm.upgrade.purge.prompt.g to preupg.bin
update panel setup.sqlup, change $L.msg.sql
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade: Refactor to use standard wizard to design UI
Dump menu SYSTEM ADMINISTRATION into preupg.bin
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade: Support to apply hotfix mechanism
Dump apm.upgrade.load.hotfix into preupg.bin
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade: Refactor to use standard wizard to design UI
Dump process, wizard and formatctrl into preupg.bin
Dump more format and menu into preupg.bin
Optimize SM Apps Upgrade steps: allow not to execute purge manually
Dump RAD apm.upgrade.purge into preupg.bin
UI improvement for SM Upgrade
build apm.upgrade.main.ux, apm.upgrade.wizard.ux and apm.upgrade.create.ux to preupg.bin
UI improvement for SM Upgrade
build apm.upgrade.verify.sql.* to preupg.bin
UI improvement for SM Upgrade
build sm.upgrade*, apm.upgrade.load.transfer* and apm.upgrade.get.utility.path* to preupg.bin
UI improvement for SM Upgrade
build format sm.upgrade.options* to preupg.bin
Put SQL Compare Utility related apps code into both preupg.bin and sqlupgrade.unl
added panel "dump.sql.datadict" to dump the datadict for "sqlupgradefield" and "sqlupgradekey"
modify panel "setup.sqlup" to add the filter of the datadict for "sqlupgradefield" and "sqlupgradekey""
added panel "dump.sql.sl" to dump the ScriptLibrary "upgradeCompareDbdict"
modify panel "setup.sqlup" to add the filter of the ScriptLibrary "upgradeCompareDbdict"
modify panel "dump.sql.dbdict" to force new Dbdict on target.
make dbdict 'DeltaMigToolKPI' overwrite older version.
export DeltaMigrationTool.unl in upgrade folder, with more items added for QCCR1E106246
export DeltaMigrationTool.unl in upgrade folder
dump the app apm.upgrade.get.utility.path to preupg.bin
Remove dump.JS panel, move deleteGL js to upgradeRecordsUpdateRoute
Created dump.JS panel to export JS code to preupg.bin.
QCCR1E61789 fixed internal log exceed max length
move the previous application and format changes to setup.preupg
add apm.upgrade.data.scan to code and enc
add apm.upgrade.data.scan to application
add upg.wiz.data.scan and upg.wiz.scan.summary to format
add dump.signatures dump.signaturemake
add dump.pathes for bad data scan
move dump.pseudolog, dump.status from apm.upgrade.transfer(transfer.bin) to apm.upgrade.build.other(preupg.bin)
needed to fix a mistake on the setup.preupg panel. I had 'application=' for the query when it should be 'application.name='
added additional query against the format table to include the 'apm.upgrade.results' formats. This way the 'view/merge upgrade result' link will work correctly.
Added to the setup.preupg panel:
added queries for the sm.upgrade application. This used to be loaded in with transfer.bin.
DE3051 Only call apm.upgrade.dump.more.records once.
S2090 Changes to accomodate automated upgrade build in the 7.1 branch
S2090 Changes to accomodate automated upgrade build
Added processing to support the addition of RAD=sm.upgrade and format=sm.upgrade.options to preupg.bin
Removed JS dump to new RAD app.
Added processing to support the addition of dbdictHelper and tableFunctions ScriptLibrary records to preupg.bin
Modification made for DEVTX BUG14682 to extract apm.upgrade.fix.help into the preupg.bin.
